name: Mad Monkey on Broadway
description:
Modern bathrooms, air-conditioned dorms, and stylish decor, providing a comfortable base for your Sydney adventures.

Welcome to Mad Monkey Broadway, where comfortable accommodation meets genuine backpacker community! Just a short stroll from Sydney's bustling Central Station, we offer a tranquil and homely experience, perfect for relaxing and connecting with new friends, all while being part of the vibrant Mad Monkey Family.

We cultivate a quieter, chiller atmosphere – ideal for unwinding after a day of exploring – where you'll often find fellow travellers picking up a guitar for a jam session or simply sharing stories and plans. While we offer this laid-back vibe, we still host awesome organised events and nights out to help you meet new friends and create unforgettable memories. You'll love the convenience of a power point at each bed, ensuring you stay charged and comfortable. 

Here's what you'll enjoy with every stay, all included in your room rate:
- Ultrafast WiFi
- Free Local Gym Access
- Large Security Lockers (BYO padlocks)
- Complimentary Tea & Coffee
- Organised Events & Nights Out 7 days a week 
- Air-conditioned Dorms

Our prime location makes it incredibly easy to explore Sydney. We're just a stone's throw from vibrant Newtown, famous for its eclectic shops, street art, and diverse dining scene. Closer to home, parks, a great swimming pool just across the road, diverse restaurants, lively nightlife, and the Broadway shopping centre are all within walking distance. A single bus ride will take you straight to Sydney's gorgeous beaches, and iconic landmarks like the Sydney Harbour Bridge & Opera House are also close by!

Important Info for Your Stay:
- Reception hours are 8 am - 8 pm. If you're checking in after these hours, please give us a call beforehand.
- Check-out is before 10 am and check-in is after 2 pm.
- We are a strictly 18+ property. While all adults are welcome, dorm rooms are recommended for guests aged 18 to 35.
- A valid passport or international passport is needed for check-in.
- Your card will be charged 1 day prior to your arrival. Please ensure there are sufficient funds to avoid cancellation.
- Group Bookings: Bookings of 4 or more guests are subject to different terms and conditions, and we cannot guarantee placing all members of a group booking in the same room.
- Please note: No E-Bike batteries are allowed on the premises.

Join us at Mad Monkey Broadway – your gateway to an amazing Sydney adventure with new friends!

houseRules.notes:
We are a strictly 18+ property.
Recommended ages for dorm rooms is 18 to 35. We would advise booking a private room (where available) if outside of this age range for your own comfort.

Reception is open 8am to 8pm. Please email to organise late check in by night staff (up to 2am). 

There is a night manager from 8pm to 2am to check-in any late arrivals
Check out before 10am and check in after 2pm

All payments made by credit card at the property are subject to a 1% credit card fee.

Please Note: Our reception is closed on the 25th December. You will not be able to check in or out on that date. Payment for all reservations made between 24th December & 2nd of January will be taken when the booking is made and are NON REFUNDABLE. If the credit card is invalid or insufficient funds you have 72 hours to update your details otherwise your booking will be cancelled.

CHRISTMAS AND NEW YEAR’S: All bookings between 23rd December and 2nd January are NON-REFUNDABLE and are subject to a 10 night minimum stay. Payment will be processed within 72 hours of booking and if the card cannot be charged then your booking will be cancelled.
Please also note that our reception will be closed to arrival and departures between 23rd December and 2nd January: no check-ins or outs will be allowed during this time. If your booking contains a check in/out scheduled for those dates then it will be subject to immediate cancellation.

categories.category_description: This hostel has begun to introduce practices that result in a positive social and environmental impact, grasping the fundamentals of the Staircase to Sustainability.
